item.title: MSc – Human–Computer Interaction
item.description:
• Focused on user‑centered design, prototyping, and qualitative research methods.
  • Completed a thesis on how micro‑interactions influence perceived usability in complex tools.
  • Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams on projects spanning mobile apps, responsive web, and interactive installations.

item.title: UX / UI Designer – SaaS
item.description:
• Designed end‑to‑end workflows for analytics and reporting, making it significantly easier for non‑technical users to understand product performance.
  • Ran lightweight discovery and usability sessions, feeding insights directly into prioritization and roadmap discussions.
  • Created a shared library of interaction patterns, empty states, and error messages, improving consistency across multiple teams.
